summary: American singer Johnny Tyrone is enlisted by sinister forces to assassinate an Arab king whose daughter he has fallen in love with.
cast: Elvis Presley|Mary Ann Mobley|Fran Jeffries|Michael Ansara|Jay Novello|Phillip Reed|Theodore Marcuse|Billy Barty|Dirk Harvey|Jack Costanzo|Larry Chance|Barbara Werle|Brenda Benet|Gail Gilmore|Wilda Taylor|Vicki Malkin|Ryck Rydon|Richard Reeves|Joey Russo|Paul Bradley|Carolyn Carter|Suzanne Covington|Eileen Diamond|Judy Durell|James Gonzalez|Robert La Mont|Ralph Lee|Ethelreda Leopold|Paul Power|Tony Regan|Hugh Sanders|Bernard Sell|Maja Stewart|Les Tremayne|Sid Troy|Red West
title: A lo loco
